title: Champion not responding to my mouse click commands
body:
ok so for some time now whenever I play league my champion will randomly stop responding to my rights clicks and no matter how many times I right click it still remains at place 

My fps and ms remains the same whenever it ignore my commands. Reinstalled the game not long ago and its the same problem. 

Anyone got a solution for this?

replies.body:
Hey Rquipi, 

Though your FPS and ms stay the same you may still want to give Riots FPS KB a try and see if that fixes the issue. 

FPS KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting

Make sure to follow the steps all the way and see if that helps. I'll be on for a bit so feel free to reach out to me. 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}

Hey Pika Knight. Ive followed most of these steps and still encounter the same issue. Ive never encountered this issue atleast not as badly until this recent patch. Its not my internet (atleast i dont think) Ive done the speed test and I used to be able to have up to 3 friends play LoL all at once on my internet. But Now I can barely play a good game. My friend using a Mac on the same internet also encounters the problem. 

I dont know if its League itself, My connection, or my computer. simply lost. please help.
